metadata.title: CVE-2021-39847 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
XMP Toolkit SDK version 2020.1 (and earlier) is affected by a stack-basedbuffer overflow vulnerability potentially resulting in arbitrary codeexecution in the context of the current user. Exploitation requires userinteraction in that a victim must open a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1
libexempi8 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1ubuntu0.1').
